attributes.action: Change quarentine & testing rules when travelling to UK from 10 days to 5
attributes.background:
At the moment the Government considers that on day 5 a person returning to UK can be released after purchasing a day 5 test when tested negative.
If this is the case  I would like for the quarantine time to be reduced from 10 to 5 days to avoid unnecessary testing and expenditure to the traveller.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see travel rules changed, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Your petition calls for quarantine and testing rules to be changed, but it appears the only change you want is for the quarantine period for travellers from amber-listed countries to be reduced from 10 to 5 days.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
